uuid.description: The unique identifier of the season.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, a season.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the season.

mediumDescription.description: The medium description of the season.

longDescription.description: The long desciption of the season.

media.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

categories.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this season.

tags.description: A list of the Tags taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this season.

published.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the season has been published.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the season.

productionNumber.description: The production number of the season.

seasonNumber.description: The season number of this season. This can be used to sort the order of the season by season number.

seasonStartDate.description: The start date of the season.

seasonEndDate.description: The end date of the season.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the post to use in its canonical URL.

program.description: The series or event that is the parent program of this season.

castCredit.description: The Uuid of the cast associated with this object.
